ALES
Class ALES_Board

java.lang.Object
  ALES.ALES_Board
public class ALES_Board
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
0.1 Contains all of the information specific to one game board - size, oxygen level, etc.
Author:
Mike Balaun, Ed Bullwinkel, John Daigle, Larry Eisenstein
